title: Dusty path
body: You have spent an eternity on this path. It feels like an old companion. Ahead there is a fork in the road. To the east lies an open meadow, and to the west is a thick woodland. The old faithful dusty path is still behind you.

title: Open Meadow
body: Dang, this is one open meadow. You can see a wooden fence surrounding a small village. There is a steep hill as well...

title: Thick woods
body: Dang, this is one thick woodland. It is getting darker and damper as you venture deeper into the forest. What will do head into the dark or into the damp?

title: Swamp
body: It is damp and getting ever so humid as the woodland subsides and gives way to a festering swamp. There is a stream in one direction and stepping stones in the other. Which one will you follow?
